Id.description: The unique ID of the detector.

Kubernetes.description: Describes which Kubernetes data sources are enabled for a detector.

MalwareProtection.description: Describes whether Malware Protection will be enabled as a data source.

S3Logs.description: Describes whether S3 data event logs are enabled as a data source.

CFNDataSourceConfigurations.description: Describes whether S3 data event logs, Kubernetes audit logs, or Malware Protection will be enabled as a data source when the detector is created.

CFNFeatureAdditionalConfiguration.description: Information about the additional configuration of a feature in your account.

AdditionalConfiguration.description: Information about the additional configuration of a feature in your account.

Name.description: Name of the feature. For a list of allowed values, see [DetectorFeatureConfiguration](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/guardduty/latest/APIReference/API_DetectorFeatureConfiguration.html#guardduty-Type-DetectorFeatureConfiguration-name) in the *GuardDuty API Reference* .

CFNFeatureConfiguration.description: Information about the configuration of a feature in your account.

Enable.description: Describes whether Kubernetes audit logs are enabled as a data source for the detector.

CFNKubernetesAuditLogsConfiguration.description: Describes which optional data sources are enabled for a detector.

AuditLogs.description: Describes whether Kubernetes audit logs are enabled as a data source for the detector.

CFNKubernetesConfiguration.description: Describes which Kubernetes protection data sources are enabled for the detector.

ScanEc2InstanceWithFindings.description: Describes the configuration of Malware Protection for EC2 instances with findings.

CFNMalwareProtectionConfiguration.description: Describes whether Malware Protection will be enabled as a data source.

Enable.description: The status of S3 data event logs as a data source.

CFNS3LogsConfiguration.description: Describes whether S3 data event logs will be enabled as a data source when the detector is created.

EbsVolumes.description: Describes the configuration for scanning EBS volumes as data source.

CFNScanEc2InstanceWithFindingsConfigurat.description: Describes whether Malware Protection for EC2 instances with findings will be enabled as a data source.

description:
The `AWS::GuardDuty::Detector` resource specifies a new GuardDuty detector. A detector is an object that represents the GuardDuty service. A detector is required for GuardDuty to become operational.

Make sure you use either `DataSources` or `Features` in a one request, and not both.

DataSources.description: Describes which data sources will be enabled for the detector.

Enable.description: Specifies whether the detector is to be enabled on creation.

Features.description: A list of features that will be configured for the detector.

FindingPublishingFrequency.description: Specifies how frequently updated findings are exported.

Tags.description:
Specifies tags added to a new detector resource. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define.

Currently, support is available only for creating and deleting a tag. No support exists for updating the tags.

For more information, see [Tag](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-properties-resource-tags.html) .
